Notes: A gravity area for a disk-shaped planet.

Obj_arg0.Name: Disable Bottom
Obj_arg0.Description: If enabled, only the Y+ Side of the disk will have gravity.

Obj_arg1.Name: Disable Edges
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, the edges of the disk will not have gravity.

Obj_arg2.Name: Valid degrees
Obj_arg2.Description: The radial degrees that will have gravity. Starts pointing towards X+, and then rotates counter clockwise. Default 360.0.
